name: The Middle Mages Company
description:
Sinclair, the flower mage, was stuck.

No matter what he tried, he simply could not move.

It was as if some external force was holding him in place.

But wait! Perhaps someone else could help him.

Could that someone be you, dear player?

  • Help lost seedlings navigate through unique and charming levels
  • Cast spells, push and pull blocks to give directions
  • Learn about the backstory of Sinclair, the flower mage!
